cards.name: The Fool
cards.upright: Fresh start; trust the path.
cards.reversed: Hesitation; take one small step.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.upright: Use your tools; focus.
cards.reversed: Scattered energy; simplify.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.upright: Listen within; wait.
cards.reversed: Noise over intuition; unplug.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.upright: Nurture & create.
cards.reversed: Refill first; reduce pressure.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.upright: Structure & boundaries.
cards.reversed: Loosen rigidity; lead kindly.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.upright: Learn; honour wisdom.
cards.reversed: Update beliefs; keep what serves.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.upright: Aligned choice; union.
cards.reversed: People-pleasing; choose values.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.upright: Momentum through discipline.
cards.reversed: Drift; remove one distraction.

cards.name: Strength
cards.upright: Gentle courage; compassion.
cards.reversed: Inner critic; speak kindly.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.upright: Seek your light; reflect.
cards.reversed: Isolation loop; reconnect softly.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.upright: Seasons turn; adapt.
cards.reversed: Resisting change; pivot gently.

cards.name: Justice
cards.upright: Balance; fair action.
cards.reversed: Avoidance; own your part.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.upright: Surrender; new angle.
cards.reversed: Stuck; set a time limit then act.

cards.name: Death
cards.upright: Endings clear space.
cards.reversed: Clinging; let one thing go.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.upright: Blend; steady rhythm.
cards.reversed: All-or-nothing; aim for 60%.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.upright: Name the hook; free up.
cards.reversed: Breaking chains; ask for help.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.upright: Truth shakes; rebuild honest.
cards.reversed: Aftershock care; basics first.

cards.name: The Star
cards.upright: Hope; gentle recovery.
cards.reversed: Tend the spark; small faith.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.upright: Mystery; move by lantern.
cards.reversed: Confusion; ground in facts.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.upright: Joy & clarity.
cards.reversed: Fatigue; rest without guilt.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.upright: Answer the call.
cards.reversed: Self-doubt; start where you are.

cards.name: The World
cards.upright: Completion; integrate.
cards.reversed: Loose ends; finish the last 10%.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.upright: Ace of Wands: seed moment; new potential. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Ace of Wands (reversed): hesitation blocks start. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.upright: Two of Wands: balance; make the choice. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Two of Wands (reversed): indecision; simplify. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.upright: Three of Wands: teamwork; steady progress. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Three of Wands (reversed): misalignment; reset roles. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.upright: Four of Wands: stability; protect energy. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Four of Wands (reversed): stuck/hoarding; loosen. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.upright: Five of Wands: challenge builds skill. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Five of Wands (reversed): drama drain; choose growth. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.upright: Six of Wands: fair give & receive. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Six of Wands (reversed): imbalance; restore fairness. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.upright: Seven of Wands: patience; tend growth. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Seven of Wands (reversed): impatient; small steps. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.upright: Eight of Wands: practice; refine craft. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Eight of Wands (reversed): busywork; refocus purpose. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.upright: Nine of Wands: self-respect; enjoy wins. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Nine of Wands (reversed): doubt; acknowledge progress. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.upright: Ten of Wands: culmination; share harvest. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Ten of Wands (reversed): overload; release extras. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.upright: Page of Wands: curiosity; learn by doing. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Page of Wands (reversed): restless; start tiny. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.upright: Knight of Wands: momentum; steer wisely. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Knight of Wands (reversed): impulsive; slow 10%. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.upright: Queen of Wands: embodied wisdom; nurture. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: Queen of Wands (reversed): refill your cup. Shadow: scattered effort.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.upright: King of Wands: lead with clarity. Themes: energy/creativity.
cards.reversed: King of Wands (reversed): control without care; soften. Shadow: scattered effort.
